org.cougaar.core.agent
Interface AgentStateModelService

All Superinterfaces:
GenericStateModel, Service
public interface AgentStateModelService
extends Service, GenericStateModel

This service allows a component within the agent to transition the agent's state (suspend/resume/stop/unload).

This is only for use by RehydrateEarly, to transition the state for agent mobility.

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from interface org.cougaar.util.GenericStateModel
ACTIVE, IDLE, LOADED, UNINITIALIZED, UNLOADED
 
Method Summary
